# SetDecibelValue

**Instance Method**

Sets the decibel value of the level control.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t SetDecibelValue(float in_decibel_value);
```

## Parameters

- **in_decibel_value**: The decibel value to set.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Discussion

If successful, changing the scalar value sends a notification to the host to update the object state.

This method synchronizes by using the work queue created by the object.

## Accessing the Value

- **SetScalarValue**: Sets the scalar value of the level control.
- **GetScalarValue**: Gets the scalar value of the level control.
- **GetDecibelValue**: Gets the decibel value of the level control.
